font.strong:
It is my pleasure to welcome you to Bartonville Grade School. The faculty and staff join me in saying we are happy to have you as a part of the BGS family. I am looking forward to another successful school year.
--Superintendent Dr. Lan Eberle

ATTENTION: GOVERNOR PRITZKER HAS ORDER ALL ILLINOIS PUBLIC SCHOOLS CLOSED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE 2019-2020 SCHOOL YEAR
